actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to eliminate the complexities of the estate tax deduction for family-owned business and farm interests by increasing the unified estate and gift tax credit to $3,000,000 for all taxpayers.
short_title: Estate Tax Reduction and Simplification Act of 1999

summary.text: Estate Tax Reduction and Simplification Act of 1999 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the unified estate tax credit deduction to $3 million.

titles.title: Estate Tax Reduction and Simplification Act of 1999

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to eliminate the complexities of the estate tax deduction for family-owned business and farm interests by increasing the unified estate and gift tax credit to $3,000,000 for all taxpayers.
